old:
――ほう、ほうほう！
良いッ！　良いぞおぬしッ！！
column2: Oh, I see, I see! Well done! Excellent, my good sir!

old:
あの偏屈ながら確かな目を持つ
ナディアが認めたということは
この東ザンドラで相当の死合いを
くぐり抜けてきたと見える！
column2: The fact that even Nadia, with her eccentric yet keen eyes, has acknowledged it means they must have endured some serious battles here in East Zandora!

old: おぬし、《ウォリアー》を志してはみんか？
column2: Are ye aspiring to be a Warrior?

old:
両手に握りしめたエモノに
渾身の力を込め、溜め、振り下ろすッ！！
それは世界の中心は我が両腕と思えるほどの
恍惚の時ッ！！
column2:
With a firm grasp on it in both hands, I gather all my strength, concentrate and swing down!!
It is a moment of ecstasy so intense that I feel the world revolves around my arms.

old:
――おおおおッ！
今、鼻の穴が開いたな！？
そうだ！！　そうこなくてはッ！
column2:
――Ohhh! My nostrils are flaring! 
Is it true?! Yes! 
It has to be like this!

old:
遠慮することはない！
我が課題に挑戦するが良い！
column2:
There is no need to hold back!
You should challenge yourself to tackle my task!

old:
さすればこのオリバー
おぬしを《ウォリアー》として、さらなる
強者の高みに推し上げてくれるッ！！！
column2: Then this Oliver will take you as a "Warrior" and propel you to even greater heights of strength!

old:
フハハハハッ！！
どうした、声が小さいぞ！！
column2:
Hahahahaha!
What's the matter, your voice is so quiet!

old:
より強く、より熱く、そしてより激しくッ！！
剣を振れば振るうほど、その頂きが
いかに遠いか思い知る日々よッ！
column2:
Stronger, hotter, and fiercer!
The more I swing my sword, the more I realize how far away the top is!

old: そうは思わないか！？　ん？
column2: Don't you think so?! Hm?

old:
うむ！　おぬしはなかなかの猛者と見たッ！！
どうだこのゾマは！！
column2:
Indeed! I see you are quite the formidable warrior!! 
How about this Zoma!!

old: 腕を磨くには持って来いだろう！？
column2: It would be perfect to enhance your skills, wouldn't it!?

old:
むううううんッ！！
コロッサスもキメラももはや物足りん！！
column2:
Muuuuunnnn!
Colossus and Chimera are no longer enough!

old:
我が死合いの相手が務まるは
古のカラクリ人形くらいのものか！
column2:
Is there anyone capable of facing me in battle?
Someone as skilled as an ancient clockwork doll!

old:
おぬし、受けた傷の痛みは忘れんと
いう気概はあるか！？
column2: Do you have the determination not to forget the pain of the wounds you've received!?

old:
《ウォリアー》たるもの、わが身に受けし
痛みは倍返しが要！
column2: As a Warrior, I have to take it in my body and double the pain!

old:
フハハハハハッ！！
うむ、おぬしの覚悟、しかと認めたりッ！
column2: Hahaha! Arisen, I have duly recognized your resolve!

old:
《ウォリアー》として剛の剣を振るうに
相応しい気概、気に入ったぞ！
column2: As a Warrior, wielding a mighty sword with the appropriate determination, I am pleased with your spirit!

old:
敵を倒す！　食らいついてでも倒す！
受けた痛みは倍返しで叩き潰すッ！！
column2:
Defeat the enemy! 
Even if it means sinking your teeth into them, bring them down! 
The pain endured will be returned twofold as you crush them!!

old:
《ウォリアー》なれば、最強の強者を
目指し死合う事こそ、本望であり本分
column2:
To become a Warrior and strive for battle
Is my true wish and duty
To become the strongest of the strong

old:
ファイターとは根本的に違う生き物だという
ことを、心にしかと叩き込めッ！！
column2: Impress upon your heart that a Fighter is fundamentally a different being!!

old:
おおおおッ！！
良い面構えになってきたなッ！
おぬしの筋肉も気合で震えておるわ！
column2:
Ohhhhhh!!
You're starting to look good!
Your muscles are trembling with fighting spirit!

old:
よぉーしッ！　おぬしに我が剛剣の業を
一つ伝授してやる
薙ぎ払い、敵を打ち砕くのだッ！！
column2:
Alright!! I shall bestow upon you the skill of my mighty sword. 
Learn to strike down your enemies and crush them!

old:
ファイターとは異なる剛の剣、それが
《ウォリアー》よッ！！
column2:
A sword of Strength, distinct from a Fighter;
that is the Warrior!!

old:
盾など不要！　敵にぶつかり叩き潰すッ！
そして受けた痛みは闘志に変えて叩き返すッ！！
column2:
No need for a shield! Crush the enemy by crashing into them!
And turn the pain you receive into fighting spirit to strike back!

old:
その生きざまをよしとするなら
共に振りかぶろうではないか！
ぶ厚き刃を、力の限り！！
column2:
If you approve of that way of life, let's wield it together!
Let's swing our thick blades with all our might!

old:
ううううむッ、おぬし！
全身に漲るその闘気、ただならぬ気迫！
大したものよッ！
column2:
My goodness, it's you! 
The fighting spirit that fills your whole body, such extraordinary determination! 
You're quite something!

old:
――良い、良いぞォッ！！
フッフフフ、我が剛剣の奥義、おぬしになら
伝授してくれよう
column2:
Good, good job!
Hah, I shall teach you the secret technique of my formidable sword!

old:
そしてさらに腕を磨き、我が最高の好敵手
として育つが良いッ！
さぁッ、体得せよッ！！
column2:
Then hone your skills further and grow up to be my best opponent!
Now, learn it!

old:
おおお！！
鋭き眼光、鈍く光りしおぬしのエモノ――！
おぬし、《ウォリアー》を極めんと志すのだな！
column2:
Ohhh!! 
The sharp gaze, the dull glimmer of your eyes, you are a Warrior, aspiring to master it!

old:
よくぞ踏み出した！！
これからおぬしが歩みしは
真なる強者への覇道ッ！！
column2:
Congratulations on taking the first step!!
From now on, the path you tread leads to becoming a true conqueror!!

old:
向かう所の敵全て薙ぎ、倒し、砕くっ！！
鉄と血の道よ！！
column2:
Cleave, defeat, and crush all enemies in your path!!
The way of iron and blood!!

old:
――おおおおッ！
今、鼻の穴が開いたな！？
そうだ！！　そうこなくてはッ！
column2:
――Ohhh! My nostrils are flaring! 
Is it true?! Yes! 
It has to be like this!

old:
遠慮することはない！
我が課題に挑戦するが良い！
column2:
There is no need to hold back!
You should challenge yourself to tackle my task!

old:
さすればこのオリバー
おぬしを《ウォリアー》として、さらなる
強者の高みに推し上げてくれるッ！！！
column2: Then this Oliver will take you as a "Warrior" and propel you to even greater heights of strength!

old:
さぁッ、遠慮することはない！
共に試練を越え歩もうではないか！
強者の頂きへッ！！
column2:
Now, there's no need to hold back!
Let's overcome trials together and move forward!
To the peak of the mighty!!

old:
おお、あの偏屈ながら確かな目を持つ
ナディアに認められし戦士というのは
おぬしか！
column2: Oh, that eccentric yet perceptive warrior recognized by Nadia, could it be you?!

old:
ほうほう、ふむふむ！
なかなかどうして気張っているようだな！
column2:
Hmmm... hmmm... hmmm... hmmm... hmmm... hmmm!
You seem to be quite determined!

old:
――が、まだまだだ！
おぬしが《ウォリアー》として真の強者を
目指すなら、まずは自力で
ジョブレベル１８に至るのだッ！！
column2:
- However, you still have a long way to go!!
If you aspire to be a true strong warrior, first of all, strive to reach Level 18 in your job by your own effort!!

old:
しかる後、おぬしの戦いぶりを見てきた
訓練官から新たな修練への太鼓判を
もらうがいい！
column2: Afterwards, you should receive the trainer's endorsement for further training, having witnessed your fighting style!

old:
おぬしが我が前に現れるのを
楽しみに待っているぞッ！
column2: I eagerly await your appearance before me!

old:
ほほう！　その力コブに強き眼光――
すでに基本の心得は掴んだと見た
レベルとしては十分よッ！
column2:
Oh ho! That strong gaze of yours, focused on your goal.
I can see that you have already grasped the basics.
As far as levels go, you are more than sufficient!

old:
《ウォリアー》としての道を究めんとするならば
おぬしの戦いぶりを見てきた
訓練官から新たな修練への太鼓判を
もらうがいい！
column2: If you seek to master the path of the 'Warrior,' then you should receive the trainer's endorsement for further training, having witnessed your fighting style!

old:
しかる後、我が前に戻れ！
その時こそ真のウォリアーとしての
一歩が始まるのだッ！！
column2:
Afterwards, return before me!
That is when the true Warrior's first step begins!!
